title: Pig the Pug
description:
"Pig was a Pug and I'm sorry to say, he was greedy and selfish in most every way."
Pig is the greediest Pug in the world. He is ill-tempered, rude and unreasonable. When Pig the Pug is asked to share his toys, something unexpected happens. Hopefully Pig has learned a lesson!For ages 5-9
author: Aaron Blabey
